title: Security
content: OpenAI invests in security as we believe it is foundational to our mission. We safeguard computing efforts that advance artificial general intelligence and continuously prepare for emerging security threats. The OpenAI API undergoes annual third-party penetration testing, which identifies security weaknesses before they can be exploited by malicious actors. OpenAI has experience helping our customers meet their regulatory, industry and contractual requirements (e.g., HIPAA). Contact us to learn more.
